Open Source Media

Notice anything different? MediaFront is evolving! With the latest 2.0 release of the Open Standard Media (OSM) Player, we are also working very hard to bring you a new http://mediafront.org website. There will be a lot of changes around here, so check back regularly!

Welcome to MediaFront!

Introducing the Open Standard Media (OSM) Player 2.0!

The mediafront platform is an open source (GPLv3) front end media solution for the web. Through its integration with popular content management systems, it employs an innovative and intuitive interface that allows any website administrator to completely customize the front end media experience for their users without writing any code! In addition, this platform offers two industry changing - open source media players that can be used free of charge on any website! Including the Open Standard Media (OSM) Player ( as shown ), which is an open source (GPLv3) all-in-one HTML5 media player for the web, and the Dash Media Player which is a full featured Flash media player. We hope you enjoy MediaFront!

Download on GitHub!
